pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
meanings: click (e.g. of a retractable pen or mechanical pencil)

lessons.japanese: ノックしないで急に部屋に入ってこないでくれ。
lessons.english: Don't burst into the room without knocking.

lessons.japanese: どうぞ入る前にノックしてください。
lessons.english: Please knock before you come in.

lessons.japanese: 入室前はノックをしてください。
lessons.english: Please knock before you come in.

lessons.japanese: ドアをノックしなさい。
ジムは第７ラウンドにノックアウトを食らった。
lessons.english: Jim was counted out in the seventh round.

lessons.japanese: 母親がドアをノックした。
lessons.english: Her mother knocked on the door.
